body_html:
BTW, locations in contrib mirror official locations for easy of moving between the two, so

<gitroot>/tensorflow/<somepath> is translated to <gitroot>/tensorflow/contrib/projectname/<somepath>

So in your case "hooks" is project name, but <somepath> part remains the same. 37fbebd is a recent example of moving something to contrib. Sorry this is taking so much work, it's faster the second time you do it!
body_text:
BTW, locations in contrib mirror official locations for easy of moving between the two, so
<gitroot>/tensorflow/<somepath> is translated to <gitroot>/tensorflow/contrib/projectname/<somepath>
So in your case "hooks" is project name, but <somepath> part remains the same. 37fbebd is a recent example of moving something to contrib. Sorry this is taking so much work, it's faster the second time you do it!
body:
BTW, locations in contrib mirror official locations for easy of moving between the two, so

`<gitroot>/tensorflow/<somepath>` is translated to `<gitroot>/tensorflow/contrib/projectname/<somepath>`

So in your case "hooks" is project name, but `<somepath>` part remains the same. https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/37fbebdd is a recent example of moving something to contrib. Sorry this is taking so much work, it's faster the second time you do it!
